CustomField.description: This is a Rollup Field in which calculates Our Costs for the Project to be Used in the Total Margin Calculations This is not used on Quote Page Views and functions as a background formula field only
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a Rollup Field in which calculates Our Costs for the Project to be Used in the Total Margin Calculations This is not used on Quote Page Views and functions as a background formula field only
CustomField.label: Total - Our Costs - Rollup
